alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 3:05PM AKST until December 24 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...From 9 AM Saturday to midnight AKST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts will start to ramp up Saturday morning with strongest winds Saturday afternoon. Saturday evening should see wind gusts calming down.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
